def func(pct, allvals):

    return "{:.1f}%\n({:d} g)".format(pct, absolute)

axbar.pie(y,labels = x,autopct = lambda pct:'{d:.1f}%'.format(d = pct),textprops = dict(color="w"), startangle =0,explode=(0.1,0.1,0.1,0.1))

import numpy as np
plt.style.use('classic')
data_samples = np.random.normal(170,10,300)
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(5,5))
ax = fig.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
ax.hist(data_samples,density=True, bins=100)
ax.set_title("plot histogram")
ax.set_ylabel("values")
